body.name: Bandolino Women's Mandie Figure Flattering High Rise Skinny Jean
features: Fabric type 59% Cotton, 28% Polyester, 12% Viscose, 1% Spandex
STYLE - Figure flattering jean with functional five pockets, front zipper fly and belt loops to add color on a stretch contour body
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to a basic tee shirt and footwear from trendy heels to your favorit flats
LENGTH - high waist skinny has a 29 inch average inseam from crotch to hem with 11 inch leg opening
Bandolino Blu - A feminine jeanswear brand known for its exceptional denim fit, innovative fabric and trend-right washes
body.description: Bandolino Blu Women's Apparel; Mandie figure flattering High Rise Skinny Jean with fully functional five pockets and easy front zipper get you in and out to tackle the date in comfortable style. Use belt loops to add a little pop of color with a cool belt or thin scarf on this slinky contour fit body. Made in a nice stretch denim fabric that can easily be dressed up or dressed down to keep you moving in comfort from day to night. Pairs great with all tops from fashion forward to your basic tee and any footwear from trendy heels to your favorit sneakers to help you look your best from all angles. This light weight figure flattering high waist jean pant is ideal travel attire and a must have flexability piece for any wardrobe. - It's distinctive, updated details, femininity and flawless fit are the signatures of the Bandolino brand. Bandolino is a feminine jeanswear brand known for its exceptional denim fit, innovative fabrics, and trend-right washes. Sophisticated knits, woven tops, and jackets that work back to the denim round out the product assortment. Bandolino is an accessible department store brand providing refreshing options for the fashionable missy consumer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bandolino Blu is a feminine jeans-wear brand known for its exceptional fit, innovative fabrics, and distinctive details. With a robust portfolio including: sophisticated knits, woven tops, and feminine jackets, Bandolino is your destination for a perfect pairing of quality and style. Let us complement your lifestyle, and desire for fashion with versatility. Bandolino Blu- Flawless fits, sophisticated fabrics and exceptional trends making it the perfect fit realistically and figuratively Distinctive, updated details, femininity and flawless fit are the signatures of the Bandolino brand. Our Brand's most Popular Style: Mandie Signature Straight Leg Jean - The Perfect fit jean. Figure-flattering is just the thing your collection has been missing. Made to be versatile while effortlessly chic, you'll be amazed by how many stylish ensembles you can create thanks to this wardrobe essential. Every woman should be given the gift of the perfect fit! * Our jeans run in sizes listed below: Missy sizes = 6 8 10 12 14 16 Petite sizes = 6P 8P 10P 12P 14P 16P Plus sizes = 16W 18W 20W 22W 24W

Mandie Signature Straight Mandie Skinny Bella Pull On Legging Style : A modern look with the classic fit you love from a straight leg. Make to be effortlessly chic while versatile for work or play. Amplify your denim wardrobe with luxe 360° flex for sensational stretch and incredible support giving you a figure-flattering silhouette that'll boost your confidence. Figure-flattering legging is a dreamy second skin. Silhouette boasts exceptional comfort and supportive shaping, perfect for all day wear. Description : Sits at natural waist, Contour hips and thighs, Straight leg fit, Zipper fly, Belt loops and Functional pockets. Curvy cut sides and back, Sits below natural waist, Skinny leg, Contour from hips to hem, Zipper fly, Belt loops and Functional pockets. Mid-rise sits below natural waist, Comfortable knit waistband, Contour from hips to hem, Skinny leg, Mock fly and Functional back pockets Inseam : 31 " 30 " 30 ” Leg Opening : 15 1/2 " 10.5 " 10 1/2 " Available in Petite or Plus sizes : ✓
BANDOLINO BLU - The Perfect Pairing Of Quality and Style

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love Bandolino jeans! I bought two pairs of capri Mandi jeans this summer and they fit so well I decided to try their jeans this winter! They certainly did not disappoint! They fit perfectly, are not to tight in the legs, and was beautifully! I have lost 50 lbs over this last year, so I started with a size 16, and now I’m down to a 12! The 12 is starting to get a little loose and I look forward to the day I can order a size 10!! Woo hoo! Give them a try!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was too big.
reviews.reviewText: I am a size 14.However, this 14 was too big.A 12 would have been better.The jeans looks well made despite this.I just got the sizing wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sent wrong size
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a pair of Bandolino Mandie jeans in a size 4. I received an 8. They are very nice pants but they just sent me the wrong size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great fit!!! lots if stretch. Love these jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look great, smell weird
reviews.reviewText: Yeah they looked great, smelled burnt. Strong odor. Getting weaker but still noticeable after a few washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't find these for a few years and I'm happy to find them again on Amazon! Best jeans ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice just not my style
reviews.reviewText: These are looser than I like. I thought about ordering a smaller size. I think this style is just looser in the legs and waist. I am used to a skinnier and/or tighter leg and body. I also prefer a lower waist. Tye material and color are nice. They have a bit of a stretch. Likely very nice for someone who likes a straight leg and and looser fit.
